game.title: The Lost Crown
game.objective: Find the lost crown and return it to the king.
game.description: In a land full of magic and mystery, the king's crown has been stolen by an evil sorcerer. It is up to you to embark on a quest to find the crown and bring it back to the king, restoring peace to the kingdom.
game.reward: A bag of gold coins and the gratitude of the king.

task.description: Speak to the old wise man in the village to learn the location of the ancient map.
Navigate through the treacherous enchanted forest using the ancient map as a guide.
Battle the sorcerer's minions guarding the entrance to his lair.
Find the lost crown hidden deep within the sorcerer's lair.

task.objective: Return the crown to the king
task.description: Return to the king's castle and present him with the recovered crown.
